meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>expel</kanji> and <kanji>exclude</kanji> something or someone, you’re doing <vocabulary>exclusion</vocabulary>. Alternatively, you could also call this <vocabulary>removal</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>elimination</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
